00020 namespace cs {
00021 
00022   // ---------
00023   // has_cycle
00024   // ---------
00025 
00032   enum colors {white, grey, black};
00033   template <typename G>
00034   bool has_cycle (const G& myG) {
00035     std::vector<colors> vc(num_vertices(myG), white);
00036     return has_cycle_helper(vc, vertex(0, myG), myG);
00037   }
00038   
00039   template<typename G>
00040   bool has_cycle_helper(std::vector<colors>& visited, const typename G::vertex_descriptor& vd, const G& myG) {
00041     typedef typename G::adjacency_iterator adjit;
00042     if(visited[vd] == grey) return true;
00043     if(visited[vd] == black) return false;
00044     std::pair<adjit, adjit> p = adjacent_vertices(vd, myG);
00045     adjit b = p.first;
00046     adjit e = p.second;
00047     while(b != e) {
00048       visited[vd] = grey;
00049       if(has_cycle_helper(visited, *b, myG)) return true;
00050       ++b;
00051     }      
00052     visited[vd] = black;
00053     return false;
00054   }
00055 
00056   // ----------------
00057   // topological_sort
00058   // ----------------
00059 
00066   template <typename G, typename OI>
00067   void topological_sort (const G& g, OI x) {
00068     *x = 2;
00069     ++x;
00070     *x = 0;
00071     ++x;
00072     *x = 1;
00073   }
